author: rlubke
msg: - changed expected value check to do an index search rather than an
case insensitive exact match as the value returned for the host name
may or may not be fully qualified.

author: rlubke
msg: - Changed equality check to be case insensitive.

author: rlubke
msg: - Added logic to replace occurances of |host.ip| in a query string
with the IP address of the client host where watchdog is running.
This change is primarily for the GetRemoteAddr tests.

author: rlubke
msg: - removed myErrorPage.jsp as it is not longer references by any tests.
